thread.title: A smarter way to track? New fund treats every FTSE 100 company the same
thread.title_full: A smarter way to track? New fund treats every FTSE 100 company the same

author: Ed Monk
title: A smarter way to track? New fund treats every FTSE 100 company the same
text: A smarter way to track? New fund treats every FTSE 100 company the same 'Equal-weighted' tracker treats FTSE 100's minnows the same as the index giants The right balance?: A new ETF gives you the same exposure to all the companies in the FTSE 100. Photo: AP By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 8:19AM BST 11 Sep 2015
